alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Nevada; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:44PM CDT until July 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Eastern Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Union County in south central Arkansas... Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 242 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Fulton to near Lewisville to near Welcome, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Magnolia, Hope, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, Junction City, McNeil, Taylor, Emmet, Emerson, Buckner, Perrytown, Rosston, Fulton, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, Smithland, Wesson and Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Nevada; Union
